content: How can I iterate over each character in a string in Python? I want to get each character from the string, one at a time, through a loop.

To iterate over each character in a string in Python, you can use a simple `for` loop. This allows you to access each character one at a time. Here’s an example:

```python
my_string = "Hello, World!"

for character in my_string:
    print(character)
```

In this example, the loop will go through each character in `my_string` and print it out individually. You can replace `print(character)` with any other operation you want to perform on each character.
